QuestData.Title: License to Ride
QuestData.Description:
Warlord Grimaxe told me you'd be coming to the stables to pick up your mount.
But before you go charging into battle, you'll need to learn how to ride it first.
Speak with Kildar when you're ready to learn how to ride.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Kildar to learn the Apprentice Riding skill.
